snippet.title: SNES Longplay [243] Wild Guns
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: xRavenXP

Wild Guns is a fixed-view shooting gallery game by Natsume for the Super Nintendo. It's a western game with futuristic elements. The female character, Annie, has searched down a bounty hunter by the name of Clint to help her get revenge and to rescue the few family members she has left. Another notable point is the possibily to change the color of the clothes of the characters (in the character select menu)! It's a classic western game, like SunsetRiders, but with different perspective!
So I decided to make one more longplay of this great game! This longplay was done in hard in order to showing the end credits of each character!
-------------
Clint:

Carson City: 04:44
Desolation Canyon: 10:04
Bonus 1: 15:49
Ammunition Depot: 17:01
Gold Mine: 22:09
Bonus 2: 27:32
Armored Train: 28:41
Final Fight: 34:40
-------------
Annie:

Carson City: 43:19
Desolation Canyon: 48:07
Bonus 1: 52:38
Ammunition Depot: 53:48
Gold Mine: 58:33
Bonus 2: 1:04:20
Armored Train: 1:05:29
Final Fight: 1:11:03 -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
